articles.title: Kim Jong Un Inspects Completed Breeding Station of KPA
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Inspects Completed Breeding Station of KPA
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA), gave field guidance to the Breeding Station No. 621 of the KPA which was built as a structure to be proud of in the era of the WPK.
					 Watching the stables built in peculiar style in a good place, cosy dwelling houses and flocks of goats and sheep in the pastures, he expressed great satisfaction, saying that they looked like a picture and a tremendous change took place in the remote mountain village and another socialist fairyland appeared there.
					
					 He went round the breeding research center, fields for comparing the species of grass for animals, breeding pens, cultural hall, dwelling houses and other places of the breeding station to learn in detail about its construction and management and operation.
					
					 He said he was pleased to see that a good work was done to round off the cultivation technique on the basis of a scientific calculation of the economic efficiency of various species of grass after creating fields for comparing the species of grass for animals in order to settle the issue of fodder.
					
					 He praised the station for meticulously conducing the work to massively increase the number of goats of good stock provided by the party for supplying them to other units and the work for rounding off the method of raising grass-eating animals.
					
					  He called on the station to play the role as a center and base in rounding off and widely introducing the method of raising grass-eating animals of good stock and gave important instructions to do so.
					
					 He met the family of Paek Song Jin and Yun Song Hui who moved to a new house that day and had a photo taken with them.
					
					 He repeatedly expressed his satisfaction, saying the longer he watched the station, the more spectacular it looked and wherever he went, everything was impeccable. He sent thanks to the soldier-builders in the name of the KPA supreme commander.
					
					 "Going round this station, I felt my heart aching at the thought of leader Kim Jong Il who worked heart and soul to solve the food problem of people all his life", Kim Jong Un said with deep emotion, adding how nice it would have been, if this splendid station had been shown  to Kim Jong Il already.
					
					 He expressed expectation and belief that the officials and employees of the station would put into practice the intention of the party by breeding more grass-eating animals, always bearing in mind the love for the people shown by President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He was accompanied by KPA Vice-Marshal Hwang Pyong So, director of the KPA General Political Bureau, and KPA Lieut. General Kim Jong Gwan, vice-minister of the People's Armed Forces.

articles.title: British Guests Visits Various Places
articles.content:
British Guests Visits Various Places
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- Glyn Ford, member of the National Policy Forum of the British Labor Party, and his party visited Kim Il Sung University.
					 The guests paid tribute to the statue of leader Kim Jong Il at the university and went round the E-library and the Swimming Gymnasium.
					
					 They also visited the Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill, Munsu Water Park, etc.

articles.title: 4th Rason International Trade Exhibition Held
articles.content:
4th Rason International Trade Exhibition Held
 Rason, August 21 (KCNA) -- The 4th Rason International Trade Exhibition took place in Rason City from Aug. 18 to 21. 
					 Displayed in the exhibition were over 64,000 pieces of more than 70 kinds of electric and electronic products, light industrial goods, foodstuff, daily necessities, medicines and vehicles presented by various countries including the DPRK, China, Russia, Italy and Thailand. 
					
					 Officials and people in Rason City and foreigners visited the venue of the exhibition.
					
					 During the exhibition there were scientific and technological exchange and trade transactions among companies and businessmen of different countries and a discussion on the investment in the Rason Economic Trade Zone.

articles.title: Investment Forum Held in Rason of DPRK
articles.content:
Investment Forum Held in Rason of DPRK
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- A forum on investment in the Rason economic and trade zone of the DPRK took place on the spot on Aug. 19.
					 It draws companies from Russia, China, Italy, Thailand and other countries taking part in the 4th Rason International Trade Exhibition.
					
					 The participants in the forum viewed a video on the natural and geographical conditions of the zone and its development situation and long-term plan.
					
					 They were also briefed on the legal guarantee for the zone development, business establishment and management regulations for foreign investors, the situation of foreign companies which have already invested in the zone, the vitalization of tourism, etc.
					
					 Then, speeches were made by businessmen of different companies who are willing to invest in the zone.

articles.title: Meeting of Solidarity with Cuban People Held
articles.content:
Meeting of Solidarity with Cuban People Held
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- A solidarity meeting took place at the DPRK-Cuba Friendship Pyongyang Textile Machine Factory on Thursday on the occasion of the month of solidarity with the Cuban people.
					 Present there on invitation were Ambassador German Hermin Ferras Alvarez and staff members of the Cuban embassy here.
					
					 Kim Tong Son, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea who is also vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Solidarity with Cuba, officials concerned and employees of the factory were on hand.
					
					 Speeches were made at the meeting.
					
					 Kim Tong Son said the Cuban people have covered the road of victory, honorably defending their country and gains of revolution from all moves of the enemies under the leadership of the Communist Party of Cuba.
					
					 The Korean people will always stand by the Cuban people on the same trench of the anti-imperialist, anti-U.S. struggle, he added.
					
					 The Cuban ambassador said the friendly relations between the two countries provided and developed by their preceding leaders are growing stronger thanks to Marshal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 The struggle of the heroic Korean people for smashing the U.S. moves to isolate and stifle the DPRK and achieving the peaceful reunification of the country has become a model of the world progressives, he stressed.
					
					 Prior to the meeting, staff members of the embassy went round Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill.

articles.title: Poem Reciting and Concert by Women's Union Members
articles.content:
Poem Reciting and Concert by Women's Union Members
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- There took place a poem reciting and concert of members of the women's union "We Will Always Remain True to the Party's Songun Revolutionary Leadership" at the Hall of Women on Thursday to mark the 54th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 It began with prologue "Do Shine, Day of Songun August 25".
					
					 Put on the stage were such numbers as choruses "Glory to General" and "Songun Leadership Is Best" and solo and pangchang "Sing, Road to Front".
					
					 The performers expressed their ardent yearning and boundless reverence for Kim Jong Il who led the service personnel and people to the road of victory, always finding himself at the outpost for defending the country.
					
					 They emphasized that the history of the Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Il is given a steady continuity by Marshal Kim Jong Un and will be conveyed to posterity along with the victorious advance of the great Paektusan nation.
					
					 Poems and choruses reflecting the revolutionary spirit of the women to steadily advance along the road of the Songun revolution made the concert reach its climax.
					
					 Among the audience were Kim Jong Sun, chairwoman of the Central Committee of the Democratic Women's Union of Korea, Kim Jin Ha, secretary of the Pyongyang City Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials of the women's union and its members here.

articles.title: Workers, Trade Union Members Meet
articles.content:
Workers, Trade Union Members Meet
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- There took place a meeting of workers and members of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea at the Central Hall of Workers on Thursday on the occasion of the 54th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 Hyon Sang Ju, chairman of the C.C., the general federation, made a report to be followed by speeches.
					
					 The reporter and speakers said:
					
					 For more than half a century since Kim Jong Il provided the first field guidance to the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su Guards 105th Tank Division of the Korean People's Army, he led to victory the struggle for defending socialism and building a rich and powerful country with his outstanding idea and leadership.
					
					 The revolutionary feats he performed by defending the dignity of the country and nation and providing the eternal foundation for the prosperity of the country while inspecting the forefront of revolution will always be exalted in the hearts of the army and people of the DPRK.
					
					 The Juche-based revolutionary cause of Songun is ushering in a new historic turning point as it is led by Kim Jong Un, the peerless Songun brilliant commander.
					
					 We should raise a hot wind of Kim Jong Il's patriotism in all work sites for the building of a thriving nation including the project for the stock-breeding base in Sepho area and the construction sites of power stations in tiers on the Chongchon River and Wisong Scientists Street and give fullest play to the collective might in the general advance to create the Korean speed.
					
					 Organizations and officials of the general federation should more firmly build its ranks into the ideologically pure entity and an integral organization and conduct the education in Kim Jong Il's patriotism, faith, working class and morality in a unique manner and thus prepare its members to be the vanguard fighters of the Songun revolution.
					
					 Present at the meeting were officials and members of the general federation and workers.

articles.title: 13th National Angling Contest Held
articles.content:
13th National Angling Contest Held
 Sariwon, August 21 (KCNA) -- The 13th national angling contest was held in Sariwon City, North Hwanghae Province on Thursday.
					 It brought together tens of excellent anglers selected in Pyongyang, North Hwanghae Province and other provinces.
					
					 They used angling tackles and baits prepared by themselves. The standing was decided according to the total length of fishes they caught on Lake Kyongam for four hours.
					
					 Ri Tong Myong from North Hwanghae Province placed first at the contest.
					
					 There took place an angling tackle inventions exhibition. 
					
					 Nampho City and Kangwon and North Hwanghae provinces were highly appreciated.

articles.title: History of Songun Policy in DPRK
articles.content:
History of Songun Policy in DPRK
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il inspected the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su Guards 105th Tank Division of the Korean People's Army on August 25, Juche 49 (1960), starting his Songun (army-first) revolutionary leadership. This was a manifestation of his strong will to accomplish the cause of the Songun revolution, pioneered by President Kim Il Sung, with arms.
					 That day, he gave important instructions for the increase of the unit's combat power and strengthening of the KPA while spending hours with servicepersons.
					
					 Looking at the slogan "Let us defend with our very lives the Party Central Committee headed by the respected Comrade Kim Il Sung!" displayed over the front gate of the soldier's hall, he said it is a good slogan fully representing the steadfast will of the servicepersons and civilians.    Reflected in the slogan is the strong demand that all the people should absolutely trust in and follow only their leader and sacrifice themselves for the party and leader, he said, adding that the army was the first to put up such slogan.
					
					 Then, he stressed that the servicepersons should always remain faithful to President Kim Il Sung and, to this end, it is needed to intensify the ideological education in the KPA.
					
					 And he advanced tasks to strengthen the KPA's combat ability in every way, underlining the need to conduct intensive combat and political training.
					
					 His inspection made a new milestone in developing the KPA into an army of the leader and party. 
					
					 Kim Jong Il's cause of the Songun revolution is now creditably carried forward by Marshal Kim Jong Un, and the army and people of the DPRK are rallied as one in mind around him, ready to go along the road of the Songun revolution forever.

articles.title: DPRK Military Researcher on Significance of Songun Policy
articles.content:
DPRK Military Researcher on Significance of Songun Policy
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- With the approach of the 54th anniversary of the great Generalissimo Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun (army-first) revolutionary leadership (Aug. 25), the servicepersons and citizens of the DPRK recollect the feats he performed in turning the country into a nuclear weapons state.
					 The United States is well aware that its design for world domination can never come true as long as the DPRK remains a stronghold of the anti-imperialist struggle and, that is why the former has persisted on the moves to stifle the latter, Ra Yong Sun, vice-director of the Scientific Research Department of the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum, said, adding:
					
					  Generalissimo Kim Jong Il's start of Songun guidance made it possible to protect the peace and security of the Korean Peninsula and the rest of the world. It was a manifestation of the DPRK's fixed will to invariably advance along the road of the Songun revolution pioneered on Mt. Paektu.
					
					 Under his guidance, the DPRK has covered the road of victories and glory, foiling the U.S. scheme for world supremacy.
					
					 In the 1990's, the U.S. got hell-bent on the military offensive and economic blockade against the DPRK by taking the advantage of collapse of the socialist camp. But such unprecedented hostile actions, taken by the U.S. and its allies, made the DPRK emerge a nuclear weapons state.
					
					 After all, the U.S. proved to be powerless in showdown with the DPRK which has pursued the Songun policy.
					
					 In this regard, a professor of Inje University in south Korea said it is doubtful that any special sanctions, to be imposed by the U.S. and others, would take effect on the DPRK and that the current strategic patience could hardly be a solution for the U.S. in consideration of the DPRK's efforts to improve the performance of nuclear weapons and extend their range.
					
					 A senior researcher at the Cato Research Institute, U.S. said American leaders were plunging themselves into a quagmire as regards north Korea policy. In fact, the Obama administration's north Korea policy is beset with danger of causing the worst results, the researcher warned.
					
					  The U.S. had better to think twice over the confrontation with the DPRK.

articles.title: Sauna Gel in High Demand
articles.content:
Sauna Gel in High Demand
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- The Changgwang Health Complex in the DPRK is drawing many more visitors these days for a newly-developed sauna gel.
					 The gel is considered to refresh visitors with peculiar perfume, promote the revival of skin cells and be efficacious for arthritis.
					
					 The new sauna gel is made with vegetable materials abundant in the country, said Ro Jae Hyok, deputy director of the health complex who developed the gel, when interviewed by KCNA.
					
					 He said that he paid deep attention to a kind of vegetable material which the Korean nation has used for treatment and prevention of diseases from long ago.
					
					 I had compiled the technical indexes to develop the gel with great efficacy and high rate of absorption into body, he said, adding that it was registered as one of national patents.
					
					 The gel has a good effect on softening skin and preventing skin aging.
					
					 Ro also developed shampoo and hair conditioner which are popular among visitors.
					
					 His products were presented to the 13th national exhibition of inventions and new technologies.

articles.title: Merciless Preemptive Strike Is DPRK's Legitimate Right: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Merciless Preemptive Strike Is DPRK's Legitimate Right: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and south Korean puppet war maniacs kicked off the joint military drills Ulji Freedom Guardian on Aug. 18 despite the DPRK's repeated warnings and unanimous opposition at home and abroad. 
					 Merciless preemptive strike is the legitimate and best option of the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK against the nuclear war maniacs, Rodong Sinmun Thursday says in an article, and goes on:
					
					 It was already disclosed that the "tailored deterrence strategy" which the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet forces are to apply under the simulated conditions of a real war is aimed to mount a preemptive nuclear strike in essence as it is the stage-by-stage strategy pursuant to "nuclear threat" from the DPRK. This is little short of declaring a nuclear war against the DPRK.
					
					 If the DPRK beats the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet forces, they should be hard hit without excuse and if the DPRK is determined, large and small bases of aggression should be reduced to a sea of flames and ashes. This is the steadfast stand and resolute answer of the army and people of the DPRK to cope with UFG.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and south Korean warmongers are watching for a chance to mount a preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK at any cost. Under this condition the DPRK should settle accounts with them. 
					
					 They are describing UFG as "defensive and annual one" while making it a fait accompli to ignite a nuclear war despite the sincere efforts of the DPRK for peace on the Korean peninsula. This is the shameless and brigandish sophism. 
					
					 They would be well advised to stop acting rashly and think twice if they do not want to realize in miserable death and scream that the DPRK does what it is determined once.

articles.title: KCNA on US and S. Korea's Blatant Challenge to Freedom and Peace
articles.content:
KCNA on US and S. Korea's Blatant Challenge to Freedom and Peace
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces finally kicked off the Ulji Freedom Guardian against the DPRK despite its repeated warnings and serious concern of the international community.
					 UFG is dangerous war drills aimed to mount a surprise preemptive nuclear attack upon the DPRK.
					
					 This is clearly evidenced by the fact that involved in these joint military drills are almost all headquarters of the U.S. army units to be hurled into the Korean front in the event of contingency, commanding mechanisms above the regiment level of the three services of the puppet armed forces, puppet central and local administrative bodies, munitions and non-governmental bodies and various types of weaponry including nuclear strike means.
					
					 The U.S. forces present in south Korea and overseas and the south Korean puppet forces, nearly 100 000 in all, are also involved in this saber-rattling.
					
					 A particular mention should be made of the fact that the U.S. is applying to these drills for the first time in its history the "tailored deterrence strategy" which calls for mounting a preemptive strike by mobilizing all type military means including nuclear weapons if a sign of "use of nuclear weapons and missiles" by someone is detected. This is another undisguised nuclear threat and blackmail and brings to light their aggressive nature.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean puppet group formally announced the   "tailored deterrence strategy", a scenario for preemptive nuclear attack upon the DPRK, in October last year. Later they massively introduced nuclear war equipment to south Korea, staging various forms of military exercises and creating such tense situation on the Korean peninsula that a war may break out any time.
					
					 The application of the nuclear war strategy which calls for using all forms of armed forces including nuclear weapons under this situation would result in increasing the danger of a nuclear war.
					
					 The U.S. application of the "tailored deterrence strategy" to UFG which it claims is aimed at "freedom and peace" is an outright challenge and insult to the desire and wishes of the Korean people and the world people for genuine freedom and peace.
					
					 The U.S. is trumpeting that its nuclear war strategy is aimed to "cope with the nuclear and missile threats" from someone. Meanwhile, the U.S. is letting loose sophism that it will put these war drills on an "annual and regular basis."
					
					 However, this is nothing but a poor excuse to cover up the aggressive nature of its nuclear war strategy and deceive the public opinion at home and abroad.
					
					 The U.S. application of the "tailored deterrence strategy" to war maneuvers under the simulated conditions of a real war is a vivid manifestation of its undisguised scenario to bring down the social system in the DPRK and a blatant challenge to freedom and peace.
					
					 The DPRK is a symbol of sovereignty and dignity of the Korean people and a signpost of freedom and peace.
					
					 The DPRK's sovereignty and freedom and independence on this land are firmly guaranteed by deterrence for self-defense including nukes and missiles.
					
					 The U.S. scenario to mount a preemptive nuclear attack upon the DPRK is no more than a foolish daydream.
					
					 It was none other than the U.S. which suffered a defeat historically and it was the army and the people of the DPRK that foiled every move of the U.S. which foolishly counted on its corpulent muscle.
					
					 The U.S. regretted that it fought a wrong war with a wrong rival and in the wrong place and in the wrong time. It should bear in mind that what happened in the period of the Korean war will repeat itself in the future, too.
					
					 If the U.S. seeks to do harm to the DPRK and its deterrence for self-defense through the "tailored deterrence strategy", the army and the people of the DPRK will never miss the chance but achieve the complete freedom and independence of the Korean nation on the Korean peninsula.

articles.title: KCNA Ridicules "Innovative Proposal" for S. Korean Puppet Army
articles.content:
KCNA Ridicules "Innovative Proposal" for S. Korean Puppet Army
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- The puppet Ministry of Defense of south Korea set forth what it called "innovative proposal" under the signboard of rooting out human rights abuses in the army. 
					 It was reported that the proposal presented to the puppet chief executive would be put into practice soon. 
					
					 What matters is the contents of the proposal. 
					
					 The Defense Ministry in the "proposal" cited such measures as controlling harsh treatment through monitoring system and awarding prizes to those who inform superiors of those practices, etc. 
					
					 The proposal does not contain such provision calling for reforming the brutalized military gangsters as moral human beings. 
					
					 In a word, this is a nonsensical one as it lacks essential things. 
					
					 The human rights abuses now rampant in the south Korean army are not stirred up because of lack of any somebody's watch or in the absence of informers. 
					
					 It is an inevitable product of extreme misanthropy spread in the army. 
					
					 The successive rulers of south Korea have shut their eyes to brutal disciplinary punishment and violence in the army under the pretext of "establishing military discipline." On the contrary, they have encouraged and justified them. 
					
					 It is the unchangeable conception of the military bosses that in order to have a brutalized army which unhesitatingly opens fire at compatriots it is necessary to deprive its soldiers of any humanity. 
					
					 These brutes and the criminal regime produced by them are the main factor of reducing the puppet army into hordes of wicked gangsters. 
					
					 Can the above-said mechanisms work on those who regard human beings as social animals and are accustomed to group beating? 
					
					 The puppet ruling quarters of south Korea do not have even an iota of will to improve the horrible human rights abuses in the army. They have only a foolish dream of evading the responsibility for them. 
					
					 The "innovative proposal" is nothing but an artifice to mislead the public opinion. 
					
					 South Korean people of different social standings are demanding merciless punishment of the criminals who turned the south Korean army into pronoun of murderers and rabble. 
					
					 The authorities should lend ears to the people's mind-set and bring those responsible for such brutalities including Kim Kwan Jin to a court. 
					
					 This is a real solution to the problem.

articles.title: Halt to UFG Demanded by S. Korean Organizations
articles.content:
Halt to UFG Demanded by S. Korean Organizations
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- Organizations of south Korea held the 179th action for independent reunification and peace outside the U.S. embassy in Seoul at which they denounced the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet warmongers for kicking off war maneuvers against the north.
					 Recalling that the "tailored deterrence strategy" is being applied to the Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises, the organizations said it is a plan for igniting a war, not for deterring a crisis.
					
					 The total application of this plan to UFG is an act of totally violating the south-north agreements for peaceful reunification, they charged.
					
					 The joint plan for coping with provocation of local war reflected in UFG is also aimed to totally expand the local war, they said, demanding the south Korean authorities stop at once the joint military exercises being staged pursuant to the reckless plans for aggression if they truly want confidence-building.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Defense Minister's Reckless Remarks Assailed
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Defense Minister's Reckless Remarks Assailed
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Democracy, People's Life, Peaceful Reunification and Sovereignty of south Korea on August 19 released a statement denouncing the puppet defense minister for escalating confrontation with the north.
					 Touring a forefront unit recently, he cried out for "provocation" and "retaliation", getting on the nerves of the north, the organization said.
					
					 Public is becoming increasingly vocal criticizing him for saving the Ministry of Defense which was driven into a tight corner due to the case of the death of private first class Yun and diverting the people's attention elsewhere, it noted.

articles.title: Punishment of Traitor Kim Kwan Jin Demanded by S. Korean Paper
articles.content:
Punishment of Traitor Kim Kwan Jin Demanded by S. Korean Paper
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- Kyunghyang Daily News of south Korea carried an editorial on August 19 demanding the punishment of traitor and military gangster Kim Kwan Jin, the prime mover of the illegal interference in the election.
					 The editorial recalled that the investigation headquarters of the Ministry of Defense recently announced the results of the final investigation into the illegal interference of the cyber command of the army in the election in which it said that it booked the former cyber commander and 20 others without physical detention.
					
					 Chief of the security office of Chongwadae Kim Kwan Jin who was the then minister of Defense is regarded as the guy who cannot be dealt with at random, the editorial said, adding: It is natural that Kim should be held accountable for the illegal interference in the election.

articles.title: Chongryon Headquarters Officials Condemn UFG
articles.content:
Chongryon Headquarters Officials Condemn UFG
 Tokyo, August 20 (KNS-KCNA) -- Chairmen of the headquarters of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) issued statements on August 19 denouncing the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet forces for kicking off Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises.
					 Hwang Myong, chairman of the Tokyo Metropolitan Headquarters of Chongryon, demanded an immediate halt to the joint military exercises to which the "tailored deterrent strategy" aimed to mount a preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK is formally applied.
					
					 He warned that the U.S. and south Korean authorities should stop acting rashly, clearly realizing that the DPRK and the world peace-loving people will not remain a passive onlooker to the reckless moves for igniting a nuclear war against the DPRK.
					
					 Ri Thae Hyong, chairman of the Hiroshima Prefectural Headquarters of Chongryon, condemned UFG as a nuclear war drill targeting the DPRK as it is involved by huge armed forces enough to fight a war.
					
					 He demanded the U.S. stop at once its reckless nuclear war racket and withdraw its aggression forces from south Korea.
					
					 He said he would arouse all Koreans in the prefecture to the struggle to defend peace of the country and open an epochal phase of national reunification.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Portrait of Smiling Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Portrait of Smiling Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- An event for laying a floral basket before the portrait of smiling President Kim Il Sung took place at the building of the Organization of Solidarity of the Peoples of Africa, Asia and Latin America on August 15, the 69th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 Present there were the secretary general and other members of the organization, Pak Chang Yul, DPRK ambassador to Cuba, and his embassy officials.
					
					 The participants laid a floral basket before the portrait and paid tribute to it.
					
					 The secretary general said:
					
					 We are celebrating together with the Korean people the significant day when Korea was liberated under the wise leadership of Kim Il Sung.
					
					 He liberated the people from aggression, exploitation and plunder by the Japanese imperialists and built a genuine people's country.
					
					 He also rehabilitated the country which was reduced to ashes due to the U.S. imperialists and successfully led socialist construction, building a socialist power independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence.
					
					 Now the pro-U.S. puppet regime of south Korea is kicking off nuclear war exercises against the DPRK in collusion with the U.S.
					
					 We fully support the DPRK's cause of reunification and will continue efforts to boost friendship and solidarity with it.
					
					 We sincerely wish Marshal Kim Jong Un good health and successes in his work for achieving the prosperity of the country against imperialism.

articles.title: Seminar on Kim Jong Un's Work Held in Bulgaria
articles.content:
Seminar on Kim Jong Un's Work Held in Bulgaria
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- A seminar on supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Add Eternal Brilliance to Comrade Kim Jong Il's Great Idea and Achievements of the Songun Revolution" was held by the Bulgarian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism on August 14.
					 On display at the venue of the seminar were photos documenting the undying feats of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also displayed there were works of the peerless great men of Mt. Paektu and books and pictures introducing Songun Korea.
					
					 The work was explained at the seminar to be followed by speeches.
					
					 The chief of the group said: Kim Jong Il started his Songun revolutionary leadership by inspecting the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su Guards 105th Tank Division of the Korean People's Army (KPA) on August 25, 1960, a significant event of declaring his succession to the revolutionary cause of Songun and his new start of the Songun leadership.
					
					 This day witnessed a new turn effected in strengthening the revolutionary armed forces in socialist Korea and accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche and a steady continuity of the sacred history and traditions of the Songun revolution which was pioneered and advanced with arms.
					
					 Thanks to Kim Jong Il's outstanding Songun revolutionary leadership the KPA has grown to be the matchless revolutionary army, socialist Korea could fully demonstrate its might as a satellite manufacturer and launcher and nuclear weapons state and the Korean people could smash all sorts of aggression and challenge of the imperialists and reliably protect the dignity and sovereignty of the country.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Feats Praised by Nigerian Organization
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Feats Praised by Nigerian Organization
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung will live forever as the sun of Juche in the hearts of progressives for his great exploits performed on behalf of history and humankind.
					 The Nigeria-Korea Friendship Association said this in a statement on August 14 on the occasion of the 69th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					
					 The statement said:
					
					 August 15 marks the 69th anniversary when Kim Il Sung achieved the historic cause of Korea's liberation.
					
					 Korea's liberation was a historic event which provided a new landmark for carving out the destiny of the Korean nation and brought about a decisive turn in carrying out the human cause of independence.
					
					 Kim Il Sung pioneered the new era of the national liberation struggle in colony and wisely led the struggle for the victory of the anti-imperialist cause of independence.

articles.title: Indian Figure Urges S. Korea to Abandon Policy of Depending on Foreign Forces
articles.content:
Indian Figure Urges S. Korea to Abandon Policy of Depending on Foreign Forces
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- Wipin Gupta, chairman of the Juche Philosophy Study Committee of India and editor-in-chief of the Indian and World Event, issued a statement on Aug. 15 in support of a statement released by the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea.
					 He said:
					
					 As President Kim Il Sung led the arduous anti-Japanese war to victory, bearing the destiny of the country and nation on his shoulders, the Korean people could greet a new bright morning of the nation's rebirth so desired by them.
					
					 Many decades have passed and generations have been replaced by new ones since the historic day but the complete independence and sovereignty of Korea, the desire of the President, have not yet come true.
					
					 The successive pro-U.S. conservative regimes of south Korea, obsessed by sycophancy and submission, have escalated mistrust and contradiction within the nation and blocked the reunification of the country, seeking confrontation with fellow countrymen and a war against the north as a shock brigade and servant for the U.S.
					
					 As long as the U.S., a cancer-like entity of Korea's reunification, occupies south Korea and has everything under its thumb, the north-south relations can not be mended and Korea can never be reunified.
					
					 The U.S. imperialist aggressors should be pulled out of south Korea at once.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should abandon the ruinous policy of depending on outside forces and show their sincere will to improve the relations before the world in practice.

articles.title: Anniversary of Korea's Liberation Marked in Benin, Nigeria
articles.content:
Anniversary of Korea's Liberation Marked in Benin, Nigeria
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- There took place a seminar and film show in Benin and a film show in Nigeria on Aug. 14 and 15 on the occasion of the 69th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 Films shown included Korean films "The Arch of Triumph" and "Arms of Korea".
					
					 Ali Houdou, president of the Socialist Party of Benin, said:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung led the protracted anti-Japanese armed struggle to victory.
					
					 Looking up to him as the sun of the nation and savior of national liberation, the Korean people valiantly rose up in the anti-Japanese war led by him.
					
					 The Korean people finally achieved the cause of national liberation on Aug. 15, 1945.
					
					 A vice-president of the party said:
					
					 After achieving the historic cause of national liberation, Kim Il Sung founded the Workers' Party of Korea, organizer and guide of all victories of the Korean people.
					
					 Under the leadership of the WPK the people's government was built and agrarian reform, nationalization of major industries and all other democratic reforms were carried out with success in Korea in a short period after its liberation. As a result, the working people became the masters of the country, factories and land.
					
					 At the film show in Nigeria speakers praised the President for achieving the historic cause of national liberation and saving the Korean people from the colonial slavery. They added:
					
					 The exploits performed by Kim Il Sung, benefactor of Korea's liberation, will always be enshrined deeply in the hearts of the Korean people and progressive humankind.

articles.title: Austrian Organization Condemns US-S. Korea Joint Military Exercises
articles.content:
Austrian Organization Condemns US-S. Korea Joint Military Exercises
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity Committee of Unionists for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea in Austria on Aug. 15 released a statement in denunciation of the projected U.S.-south Korea joint military exercises, Ulji Freedom Guardian.
					 The statement said:
					
					 We demand the U.S. and south Korean authorities cancel the projected Ulji Freedom Guardian targeting the DPRK.
					
					 It is absurd for the present ruling forces of south Korea to attempt to create the danger of a war against the DPRK through war exercises.
					
					 We demand the U.S. stage military exercises in its country and on its territory.
					
					 We urge the south Korean ruling forces to have dialogue with the DPRK and stop putting the Korean nation into the danger of war any longer.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige estacion no.621 de mejoramiento de variedades de EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige estacion no.621 de mejoramiento de variedades de EPC
Pyongyang, 21 de agosto (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio en el terreno la estacion no. 621 de mejoramiento de variedades levantada como una orgullosa creacion monumental de la epoca del partido del trabajo.
					Viendo los corrales y las viviendas levantados en los sitios apropiados, las cabras y ovejas en herbazal, dijo con gran satisfaccion que le parece un dibujo y que en esta tranquila aldea montanosa se ha creado otro mundo, o sea, otro paisaje socialista. 
					
					Recorriendo el instituto de mejoramiento de variedades, parcelas de comparacion de las variedades de forraje, el corral de ganados reproductores, la casa cultural, las viviendas y otros lugares de la estacion, hizo detallado conocimiento del estado de construccion y la administracion.
					
					Subrayo que le agrada mucho el que se han acondicionado las parcelas de comparacion para solucionar el problema de pienso y los empleados se enfrascan en preparar la tecnologia de cultivo calculando de modo cientifico la eficiencia economica de forraje.
					
					Evaluo la labor para reproducir las cabras de buena variedad enviadas por el partido para suministrarlas a otras unidades y completar el metodo de cria de los ganados herbivoros. 
					
					Al senalar que la empresa debe ser un centro en perfeccionar y divulgar el metodo de reproduccion y cria de los ganados herbivoros, dio las preciosas instrucciones para realizarlo.
					
					El Mariscal visito la familia del matrimonio de Paek Song Jin y Yun Song Hui quienes se mudaron a la nueva casa y tomo una foto junto con ellos.
					
					Volvio a mostrar satisfaccion diciendo que la empresa es tan vistosa y todos los lugares son perfectos y dio agradecimiento del Comandante Supremo del EPC a los constructores militares.
					
					Al  recordar al Dirigente Kim Jong Il quien dedico todo lo suyo para resolver el problema alimentario del pueblo se rompia el corazon,  dijo y agrego cuan alegria sentiria el si viera esta empresa.
					
					Expreso la esperanza y conviccion de que los funcionarios y los empleados de la estacion apoyaran practicamente la voluntad del partido al criar mucho mas ganados herbivoros sin olvidar el amor del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente por el pueblo.
					
					El Mariscal fue acompanado en esta ocasion por el vicemariscal del EPC Hwang Pyong So, jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, y el teniente general de fuerzas terrestres del EPC Kim Jong Gwan, viceministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares.

articles.title: IV exposicion internacional de mercancias de Rason
articles.content:
IV exposicion internacional de mercancias de Rason
Rason, 21 de agosto (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar del dia 18 al 21 en la ciudad de Rason la 4a Exposicion Internacional de Mercancias de Rason.
					En la ocasion fueron exhibidos los productos electricos y electronicos, articulos de industria ligera, alimentos, articulos de uso diario, medicamentos, equipos de transporte, etc. de mas de 64 mil de mas de 70 especies, presentados por varios paises incluyendo la RPDC, China, Rusia, Italia y Thailandia.
					
					Lo recorrieron los funcionarios y trabajadores de esta ciudad y los extranjeros.
					
					En ese periodo se realizaron el amplio y multilateral intercambio cientifico y tecnico, las transacciones comerciales entre las companias y las personalidades de varios paises, etc.
					
					Tambien tuvo lugar el seminario de los inversionistas de la zona economica y comercial de Rason.

articles.title: Tiene lugar seminario de inversionistas de zona economica y comercial de Rason
articles.content:
Tiene lugar seminario de inversionistas de zona economica y comercial de Rason
Pyongyang, 21 de agosto (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 19 en el mismo terreno el seminario de los inversionistas de la zona economica y comercial de Rason acaparando la atencion de las empresas, exponentes y visitantes de Rusia, China, Italia, Tailandia y otros paises que toman parte en la IV Exposicion Internacional de Mercancias de Rason. 
					Los participantes vieron una videocinta que muestra las condiciones geograficas, el estado de desarrollo y el plan de perspectiva de la zona economica y comercial de Rason. 
					
					Y escucharon sobre las garantias legales para el desarrollo de Rason, los reglamentos de fundacion y gestion de empresas de inversionistas extranjeros, la informacion de las empresas extranjeras ya entradas en esta zona, la activacion del turismo, etc. 
					
					Luego, hicieron uso de la palabra los empresarios de varias companias que tienen ganas de invertir en esta zona coreana.

articles.title: ACNC califica Ulji Freedom Guardian de desafio a la libertad y paz
articles.content:
ACNC califica Ulji Freedom Guardian de desafio a la libertad y paz 
Pyongyang, 21 de agosto (ACNC) -- Pese a las reiteradas advertencias de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y la seria preocupacion de la sociedad internacional, los Estados Unidos y los titeres surcoreanos volvieron a desarrollar los ejercicios belicos conjuntos Ulji Freedom Guardian. 
					El presente simulacro es un aventurero ensayo de guerra nuclear destinado a asestar el ataque preventivo y sorpresivo nuclear contra la RPDC. 
					
					Alli se introducen casi todos los puestos de mando de las tropas norteamericanas a ser movilizadas en el frente coreano en el tiempo de emergencia, las instituciones de mando del nivel de regimiento para arriba de las fuerzas terrestres, navales y aereas del ejercito titere surcoreano, los organismos administrativos centrales y locales y las empresas militares y civiles del Sur de Corea, y enormes armamentos mortiferos incluso los medios de ataque nuclear. Y se movilizan cerca de 100 mil efectivos surcoreanos y uniformados norteamericanos estacionados en el Sur de Corea y en ultramar. 
					
					En particular, EE.UU. aplica por primera vez en el presente simulacro la "estrategia del disuasivo de forma de ajuste" cuya meta es asestar el ataque preventivo usando las armas nucleares y los demas medios militares en el caso de que se capten los "indicios de uso de armas nucleares y misiles" de alguien. 
					
					Esto siendo otra amenaza y chantaje nucleares a la RPDC demuestra claramente el caracter agresivo del simulacro. 
					
					EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos publicaron oficialmente en octubre del ano pasado la estrategia mencionada, guion de ataque preventivo nuclear contra la RPDC. Despues, introdujeron en el suelo surcoreano enormes pertrechos de guerra nuclear y llevaron al borde de la guerra la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana librando los simulacros militares de todos tipos. 
					
					La aplicacion de la estrategia de guerra nuclear que permite usar los armamentos de todas formas incluso las armas nucleares aumentara mas el peligro de guerra nuclear. 
					
					Pues, la aplicacion de la "estrategia del disuasivo de forma de ajuste" en el simulacro conjunto Ulji Freedom Guardian, descrito por EE.UU. como entrenamiento para la "libertad y paz", deviene grave violacion e insulto al pueblo coreano y los demas del mundo aspirantes a la verdadera libertad y la paz. 
					
					Ahora EE.UU. habla ruidosamente que su estrategia de guerra nuclear es para "hacer frente a la amenaza nuclear y de misiles" de alguien y que en adelante desarrollara anual y regularmente sus ejercicios belicos. 
					
					Pero, esto es una excusa pueril para encubrir la naturaleza agresiva de la estrategia de guerra nuclear y enganar la opinion publica interna y externa. 
					
					La aplicacion de la "estrategia del disuasivo de forma de ajuste" en la guerra real es la expresion concentrada de la ambicion norteamericana de derrocar el regimen de la RPDC y resulta el desafio frontal a la libertad y la paz. 
					
					La RPDC es el simbolo de la soberania y dignidad del pueblo coreano y de la libertad y la paz. 
					
					La soberania, la libertad y la independencia de la RPDC se garantizan firmemente por el disuasivo de autodefensa. 
					
					El intento norteamericano de ataque preventivo nuclear anti-RPDC es una ilusion vana nunca realizable aunque pasen mil anos. 
					
					Historicamente, EE.UU. sufre la derrota por nuestros golpes rotundos, y el ejercito y pueblo coreanos frustran paso a paso sus maniobras  insolentes.
					
					EE.UU. no debe considerar como el pasado el amargo arrepentimiento de sus generales que habian confesado que la guerra coreana fue hecha en el lugar y tiempo mal escogidos y con el rival mal elegido.
					
					Si EE.UU. intenta danar a la RPDC aunque sea minimo con la "estrategia del disuasivo de forma de ajuste" y otros, los militares y civiles coreanos no perderan la oportunidad  y lograran la libertad y la independencia completas en la Peninsula Coreana.
